strings.string: ITA_Change your digital satellite receiver settings
ITA_Setup your digital satellite receiver including antenna, channel search, update, etc
ITA_Display the programme information of each channel in time and date order
ITA_Edit TV/radio channel list and sort them in the numerical or alphabetic order
ITA_Manage and view your multimedia content in one place
ITA_Display device information including system versions, free disk space, etc
ITA_Learn how to get the most out of PRISMCUBE RUBY
ITA_Get current weather and weather forecast for thousands of cities around the world
ITA_Access your picture collection and view them as a slideshow with transition effects
ITA_Playback videos from the beginning or resume viewing from the moment you stopped
ITA_Browse through your source folders and play music files
ITA_Run your installed add-ons which enhance the features and functions of XBMC
ITA_Configure the general settings of XBMC
ITA_Handle your multimedia files in an easy and efficient way
ITA_Display detailed information about your system status
ITA_Check your PRISMCUBE RUBY info at a glance
ITA_To see all the other menus, press i button
ITA_Access your favorite XBMC add-ons in a convenient way
ITA_Take the following steps for getting your PRISMCUBE RUBY ready for use
ITA_Select the cable connection type on your STB and configure DiSEqC setup
ITA_Perform a quick and easy automatic channel scan or search channels manually
ITA_Add new transponders or edit the transponders already exist
ITA_Configure the general settings for your digital satellite receiver
ITA_Setup Smartcard or CI-Module configuration for watching pay channels
ITA_Get the latest updates on your PRISMCUBE RUBY

ITA_When set to 'On', LNBs will be switched between low and high band
ITA_When set to 'On', DiSEqC repeats its command
ITA_Set one of the pre-defined transponder frequency and symbol rate to get the best signal strength and quality in order to confirm that your settings are correct
ITA_If you set to 'On', both the existing transponders and additional transponders that have not yet been stored to be located are scanned for new channels
ITA_When set to 'Off', only the factory default transponders of the satellites you previously selected will be scanned for new channels.

ITA_Press OK button to start a channel search

ITA_No channels available for the selected mode
ITA_When set to 'Separated', the tuner 2 receives its own signal input
ITA_however it will receive only the channel level currently being received by the tuner 1 when this is set to 'Loopthrough'
ITA_When set to 'Same with Tuner 1', both tuners are connected to the same signal source
ITA_Select a control method for tuner 1
ITA_You can add, delete or configure satellites here
